data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Submission of copy of Newspaper Publication with Quick Response (QR) Code enabling stakeholders to access the Un-audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) and the Limited Review Report for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
data.news_body: Resignation of Mr. Dharani Swaroop Raghurama from the position of Whole time director and CFO of the Company w.e.f. February 05 2026.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Addendum to the previous filed Change in Management - resignation letter was missing so that has been corrected.

data.caption: Reconstitution Of Committees Of The Board Of Directors
data.news_body: We wish to inform you esteemed organisation that the Board of Directors at their meeting held on February 05 2026 has reconstituted the Audit Committee Nomination and Remuneration Committee Stakeholders Relationship Committee and dissolved the Finance Committee w.e.f. February 05 2026.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their meeting held on February 05 2026: 
1. took note of the resignation of Mr. Dharani Swaroop Raghurama from the position of Whole-time Director and CFO of the Company w.e.f. February 05 2026 and 
2. approved the appointment of Mr. Raj Kumar Sehgal as the Whole - time director for a period of 5 years subject to the approval of the shareholders of the Company w.e.f. February 05 2026.
3. approved the appointment of Mr. Raj Kumar Sehgal as the Chief Financial officer of the Company w.e.f. February 05 2026.

data.caption: Submission Of Financial Results Under Reg 33 For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31 2025.
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby enclose herewith the financial results of Standalone and Consolidated for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 along with the limited review report received from the statutory auditors for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Submission Of Financial Results Under Reg 33 For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31 2025.
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby enclose herewith the financial results of Standalone and Consolidated for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 along with the limited review report received from the statutory auditors for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Intimation Under Regulation 30 & 33 Of Securities Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations)
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of Cambridge technology Enterprises Limited (the Company) at its meeting held today i.e. Thursday February 05 2026 has inter-alia considered and approved the following:
1. Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025.
2. Resignation of Mr. Dharani Swaroop Raghurama (DIN: 00453250) from the positions of Whole-Time Director and Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company with effect from close of business hours on February 05 2026.
3. Appointment of Mr. Raj Kumar Sehgal (DIN: 01570858) Non-Executive and Non-Independent Director as Whole-Time Director and CFO of the Company with effect from February 05 2026.
4. Reconstitution of Committees of Board and Dissolution of Finance Committee w.e.f. February 05 2026.

data.caption: Report On Transfer Requests Of Physical Shares Re-Lodged Under The Special Window.
data.news_body: We wish to inform your esteemed organisation that the report for the month ended August 31 2025 September 30 2025 October 31 2025 November 30 2025 December 31 2025 and January 31 2026 is attached herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration And Approving The Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31 2025.
data.news_body:
Cambridge Technology Enterprises Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 05/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve 1. Consider and approve the Un-Audited Standalone and consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine-months ended December 31 2025; &  
2. Take note of the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors for the quarter ended December 31 2025.  
3. Any other matter with the permission of the Chair.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI LODR -  Strike-Off Of Its Wholly-Owned Subsidiary Of The Company - N2T1 AI Solutions Private Limited.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations read with SEBI master circular dated November 11 2024 we wish to inform your esteemed organization that the Board of Directors of the company at their meeting held on November 14 2025 approved the proposal to apply for the strike off of its wholly owned subsidiary  - N2T1 AI Solutions Private Limited Incorporated under Companies Act 2013.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to reg 30 and 47(3) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 the Company has published in the newspapers a Quick response (QR) code to access the Un-audited Financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to reg 30 of SEBI (LODR) 2015 the Board has approved the appointment of Mr. Dharani Swaroop Raghurama as CFO and Mr. Sreenivasa Sastry  Tumuluru as Manager of the Company wef 14.11.2025.

data.caption: Submission Of Results Under Reg 33 For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 33 of SEBI (LODR) 2015 we are hereby enclosing the financial results both standalone and consolidated ones alongwith limited review report from the Statutory Auditors for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.

data.caption: Submission Of Results Under Reg 33 For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 33 of SEBI (LODR) 2015 we are hereby enclosing the financial results both standalone and consolidated ones alongwith limited review report from the Statutory Auditors for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Submission Of Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Under Regulation 30 & 33 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
In continuation of our prior intimation dated November 07 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 read with Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI Listing Regulations we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of Cambridge technology Enterprises Limited (the Company) at its meeting held today i.e. Friday November 14 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved the following:
1. Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025
2. Appointment of Key Managerial Personnel:

a) Mr. Dharani Swaroop Raghurama Whole Time Director as Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company with effect from November 14 2025.
b) Mr. Sreenivasa Sastry Tumuluru as Manager of the Company for a period of 5 years with effect from November 14 2025.
3. Re-Grant of Options under Existing ESOP Schemes:
4. Ratification of Borrowings

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
We wish you to inform you that the shareholders of Cambridge Technology Enterprises Limited (the Company) at 26th AGM of the Company approved the following: 

1. The regularised the appointment of Mr. Raj Kumar Sehgal as Non-Executive and Non-Independent Director Director liable to retire by rotation. 

2. The Appointment of M/s. Kashinath & Sahu Practicing Company Secretaries as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for a term of 5 consecutive financial years.
